title: Order of the Lotus Karma
body: did Riot forget to make her available, been waiting a week for ir. :(

replies.body: I'm losing my mind waiting for the skin to be released. They released the Fnatic skins already - where's my baby Karma's skin?! dAshkjsahdfkJAH FKJHDSGKJHEKJHF Riot please!
I know!! Literally checking multiple times a dayy to see if she has been released ... but noooooo :( askdalashbalhjsc
They announced the upcoming skin in the patch. they did not release it yet. Keep waiting. It will probably be at least another week before they release it.
